derivation: from H6310 (פֶּה) and the feminine plural of a noun (from the same root as H2356 (חוֹר)), with the article interpolated; mouth of the gorges;
outline:
Pi-hahiroth = "place where sedge grows"
  1. the 3rd encampment of the Israelites after leaving Goshen in Egypt and the last one before crossing the Red Sea
